name: Repotage Krash
description:
Get the perfect story!

Repotage KRASH is a simple 2D stealth game where you have to walk around a secured building to get the perfect pieces for your story. You need to make sure to use your freedom of speech!

It was made during the schools Project week with the theme of "Freedom of Speech".

We made this!

Repotage crash is a student project made in as Highschool project during 1 week. The game was made october 2017 using Gamemaker Studio. The team included Mattias "Mau" Lundell, William Bergsmo, Anton Karlsson and Lucas Wintring.
